#Text=Sokka says : " I do n't see any guards . "
#Text=Katara says : " The Fire Nation must have abandoned the temple when Avatar Roku died . "
#Text=Aang says : " It 's almost sundown .
#Text=I think I heard something .
#Text=" Great Fire Sage says : " We are the Fire Sages .
#Text=Guardians of the temple of the Avatar .
#Text=" Aang says : " Great !
#Text=I am the Avatar !
#Text=" Great Fire Sage says : " We know .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'll hold them off .
#Text=Run !
#Text=" Great Fire Sage says : " If the Avatar contacts Roku , there 's no telling how powerful the boy will become !
#Text=Split up and find him .
#Text=" Aang says : " Follow me !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Do you know where you 're going ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Nope !
#Text=Wrong way !
#Text=" Shyu says : " Come back !
#Text=" Shyu says : " I do n't want to fight you !
#Text=I am a friend .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Firebenders are n't our friends !
#Text=" Shyu says : " I know why you 're here , Avatar .
#Text=" Aang says : " You do ?
#Text=" Shyu says : " Yes .
#Text=You wish to speak to Avatar Roku .
#Text=I can take you to him .
#Text=" Aang says : " How ?
#Text=" Shyu says : " This way .
#Text=" Great Fire Sage says : " Find him .
#Text=" Shyu says : " Time is running out !
#Text=Quickly !
#Text=" Zuko says : " What 's he up to , Uncle ?
#Text=Why did n't Commander Zhao arrest me ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Because he wants to follow you .
#Text=He knows you 'll lead him to the prize you 're both after : the Avatar .
#Text=" Zuko says : " If Zhao wants to follow a trail of smoke , then that 's exactly what I 'll let him do .
#Text=" Shyu says : " Avatar Roku once called this temple his home .
#Text=He formed these secret passages out of the magma .
#Text=" Aang says : " Did you know Avatar Roku ?
#Text=" Shyu says : " No .
#Text=But my grandfather knew him .
#Text=Many generations of Fire Sages guarded this Fire Temple long before me .
#Text=We all have a strong spiritual connection to this place .
#Text=" Aang says : " Is that how you knew I was coming ?
#Text=" Shyu says : " A few weeks ago , an amazing thing occurred .
#Text=The statue of Avatar Roku ; its eyes began to glow !
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's when we were at the Air Temple .
#Text=Avatar Roku 's eyes were glowing there , too !
#Text=" Shyu says : " At that moment , we knew you had returned to the world .
#Text=" Aang says : " If this is the Avatar 's temple , why did the sages attack me ?
#Text=" Shyu says : " Things have changed .
#Text=In the past , the sages were loyal only to the Avatar .
#Text=When Roku died , the sages eagerly awaited for the next Avatar to return .
#Text=But he never came .
#Text=" Aang says : " They were waiting for me .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey do n't feel bad .
#Text=You 're only a hundred years late !
#Text=" Shyu says : " They lost hope the Avatar would ever return .
#Text=When Fire Lord Sozin began the War , my grandfather and the other sages were forced to follow him .
#Text=I never wanted to serve the Fire Lord .
#Text=When I learned you were coming , I knew I would have to betray the other sages .
#Text=" Aang says : " Thank you for helping me .
#Text=" Shyu says : " We 'll follow these stairs to the sanctuary .
#Text=Once you 're inside , wait for the light to hit Avatar Roku 's statue .
#Text=Only then will you be able to speak with him .
#Text=" Shyu says : " No !
#Text=" Aang says : " Shyu , what 's wrong ?
#Text=" Shyu says : " The sanctuary doors , they 're closed !
#Text=" Katara says : " Ca n't you just open them with firebending ?
#Text=Like you opened that other door ?
#Text=" Shyu says : " No .
#Text=Only a fully realized Avatar is powerful enough to open this door alone .
#Text=Otherwise , the sages must open this door together , with five simultaneous fire blasts .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Five fire blasts , huh ?
#Text=I think I can help you out .
#Text="
